definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: As soon as Indian summer is over, it gets colder with each passing day…
sentences.chinese: 秋老虎刚过，天就一天比一天凉了。

sentences.english: "Why do you have to go to MIT?"asked Mr. Olesen in total astonishment.
sentences.chinese: “你为什么必须去麻省理工？”秋老虎先生惊奇地问。

sentences.english: Abhorrent still wandering, autumn season will alert the scorching.
sentences.chinese: 可恶秋老虎仍彷徨，处暑时节要鉴戒。

sentences.english: Season is still hot days, gradually turned again to seasons of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 季节渐转天仍热，时令又至秋老虎。

sentences.english: The scorching, sooner or later, see him out at noon autumn.
sentences.chinese: 处暑牵来秋老虎，早晚不见午间出。

definition: three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
the hottest period of the year/see 三伏天[san1 fu2 tian1]
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
end of 三伏[san1 fu2] (the hottest period of the year)
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
